about_the_game:
Void Nomads is an RPG set in a sci-fi universe where those who once set out for outer space can never return to inhabited planets. Dispersed among the stars, humanity learnt how to adapt and thrive in the vast cold void. Explore a wide range of locations from small ramshackle outposts to immense corporate stations. Engage with spacers, interstellar vagabonds and daring prospectors. And embark on a journey into the unknown.

Human technology depends on components found in ancient alien vessels. Their builders are long gone, but many devices remain active. Scavenging for alien technology can be dangerous, but you must take risks to survive.



Void Nomads is a single-player top-down shooter RPG. You play as an alien tech scavenger who gets implanted with an unknown device while exploring a derelict alien spaceship. Will you be able to find help before alien technology takes you over?

Key Features:

  • Focus on the story - with a dynamic dialogue system and dialogue options dependent on skills and previous interactions with the characters.
  • Multiple solutions - quests can be solved in different ways. Combat is not always the best choice.
  • Character customization - improve your skills as you level up. You can choose not only combat but also social and technical skills that can unlock new dialogue options and new ways to solve problems.
  • Top-down shooter combat - fast-paced bullet-hell style combat with dodging and multiple weapon types.
  • Boss fights - each with a different set of unique attacks and weaknesses.
